abstract: An agreement would avoid the process of filing charges and making a case, at the end of which the remedies won are often irrelevant in the fast-moving technology industry.
snippet: An agreement would avoid the process of filing charges and making a case, at the end of which the remedies won are often irrelevant in the fast-moving technology industry.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS — The European Commission said on Tuesday that it had reached an “understanding” with Google that could lead to a settlement of an antitrust investigation into allegations that Google abused its dominance of the Internet search and advertising markets.

headline.main: Google Moves Toward Settlement of European Antitrust Investigation
headline.print_headline: Google Moves Toward Settlement of European Antitrust Investigation
